entry.title: Tuesday: A mix of sun and cloud. High minus 32.
entry.summary: Sunny. Becoming a mix of sun and cloud this morning. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50. High minus 32. Wind chill minus 52 this morning and minus 46 this afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 37.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 37. Wind chill minus 46 this evening and minus 55 overnight. Hazardous frostbite conditions. Forecast issued 04:00 AM CST Tuesday 14 February 2023
